entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Salmon Arm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salmon Arm 3:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
